Episode.summary: Bow urges Dre to use his connections and secure Zoey a fellowship, but he doesnâ€™t want his daughter relying on nepotism. When Bow finds Zoey a place at the hospital, Dre balks at the idea and successfully pulls some strings at Teen Vogue. Meanwhile, Junior loses his first job at an arcade pizza joint that the twins love after he reports their unclean practices to corporate, and they shut it down.
Episode.title: Nothing but Nepotism
